rooms.description: You're standing at the entrance of the Museum of Natural History. There's a turnstile that takes tickets, but it's already been activated and opened.
This first exhibit shows the battle for earth, with the ape Caesar defeating the humans

Astronauts Taylor, Landon and Dodge are shown speaking to the ape scientist Cornelius.
 Odd. Humans can speak?

There is a museum worker here. It looks like they are refreshing the exhibit.
'Pay no attention - this is the reboot-the-franchise exhibit'.

puzzles.effects: There is a turnstile to the north. It requires some type of payment or ticket to activate.
puzzles.name: TURNSTILE
puzzles.description: The turnstile to the north is blocking your entrance to the exhibits.

puzzles.effects: A computer that seems to control an invisible forcefield blocking your motion. A password screen is waiting for an entry.
puzzles.name: PASSWORD
puzzles.description: A computer with a password screen.

fixtures.name: Computer
fixtures.description: A computer with a password screen active.
